Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was laying in bed looking up at the stars with my balcony door open, then suddenly I see an orange colored orb appear. It hovers for about 5 seconds and then shoots down, again it hovers for another couple of seconds and very quickly shoots to the left. Very eery feeling came over me but of course I go looking for it. But its to fast. My building prevented me from seeing it. I went downstairs and nothing.
Summary: Bright orange orb seen from bedroom balcony.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were 4 other sightings in Los Angeles on or around July 25th 2013
